To evaluate safety tolerance nevirapine alone combination AZT . SECONDARY : To compare effect various treatment combination virologic immunologic marker .
DOC.brief_title: The Safety Effectiveness Nevirapine Zidovudine , Given Separately Together , HIV-1 Infected Patients Who Have No Symptoms Disease
DOC.detailed_description: In Part I , patient prior AZT therapy receive either nevirapine placebo combination AZT . In Part II , patient nucleoside naive receive either nevirapine matching placebo . After 6 month , patient receive open-label nevirapine .
